Package stars

Class Review

java.lang.Object
stars.Review
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Review
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Association class to store a review written by Student for a particular Course
See Also:
Serialized Form
